毃字的基本解释

毃
qiāo
古同“敲”。

毃字的汉语字典释义

[①]［què］［qiāo］
［《廣韻》苦角切，入覺，溪。］
［《集韻》丘交切，平肴，溪。］
敲击，击。

毃字的康熙字典解释

【辰集下】【殳字部】　毃； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页587第07
【唐韻】口卓切【集韻】【韻會】克角切，?音搉。【說文】擊頭也。一曰橫擿也。【左傳·定二年】邾莊公與夷射姑飮酒，私出，閽乞肉焉，奪之杖以毃之。或作敲。　又【玉篇】口交切，音磽。又【集韻】口敎切，磽去聲。義?同。

毃字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
毃字的起名意思

暂无。

毃
Basic explanation of words
毃
qiāo
Gu Tong "knocked".
毃
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［què］［qiāo］
["Guangyun" bitter angle cut, enter into sleep, stream. ]
["Jiyun" Qiyun cross-cutting, flat food, creek. ]
Knock, hit.
毃
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Jixia] [Pan Character Department] 　毃; Kangxi Strokes: 14; Page Number: Page 587 No. 07
[Tang Yun] Kou Zhuo cut [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] Ke Jiao cut, sound question. [Said the text] also hit the head. One said Hengjue. [Zuo Zhuan·Ding 2nd Year] Lu Zhuanggong and Yi Shegu sang wine, privately out, begging for meat, grabbing the rod and arranging it. Or knock.　[Jade chapter] Oral sex cut, sound. [Jiyun] cuts in the mouth again, and makes a sound. Righteous? Same.
